titles.title: Resolution to Expand Access to Community Health Centers (REACH) Initiative

A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the Federal investment in programs that provide health care services to uninsured and low-income individuals in medically underserved areas be increased in order to double access to health care over the next 5 years.
Resolution to Expand Access to Community Health Centers (REACH) Initiative

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: Resolution to Expand Access to Community Health Centers (REACH) Initiative - Expresses the sense of the Senate that appropriations for consolidated health centers under the Public Health Service Act should be increased by 100 percent over the five fiscal years ending in FY 2006 in order to double the number of individuals who receive health care services at community, migrant, homeless, and public housing health centers.
